display_long_description:
# Travel the World, Learn Languages and Explore Cultures with Dynamic Languages

Speak English, French, German, Italian, Spanish and Japanese in VR Lessons, Conversations & Trips

**VR Language Learning**

We use immersive media, speech recognition, and AI features to get you speaking your target language in authentic environments.

[media]

# TRIPS

Travel the world, **repeating keywords and answering questions** while you’re immersed in the language, history and culture of the country. 

It’s the **most immersive and culturally enriching** way to learn a language.

[media]

# LESSONS

Go from zero language to having confident conversations in Japanese and Spanish with on-demand, immersive, 360 video lessons.

Use your new language skills and speech recognition to have fun and interact with your teachers and classmates in our beginner Japanese and Spanish lessons.

# CONVERSATIONS
Conversations are our newest addition. Speak with real people and practice communicating in realistic scenarios.

Available in English, Japanese and Spanish.

[media]

**LIVE**
- 150+ Trips in English, French, German, Italian, Spanish (A2-C2) and Japanese (N5-N2)
- 40 Japanese Lessons & Conversations (N5)
- 5 Spanish Lessons
- Spanish Conversations (A1-B1)
- English ESOL Conversations

**COMING SOON**
- French, German, Italian Conversations
- More Trips
- 2 New Languages
- New AI Features

**OUTSIDE OF VR:**
- Worksheets & Transcripts
- “How to Learn” Video Series
- Discord Community

Subscription app with demo.

Suitable for individuals and groups (schools, colleges, universities, etc).
